extracted_playbook.title: Apply Latest Patches for Microsoft Outlook
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the latest patches for Microsoft Outlook are applied to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit Exchange Message Items
extracted_playbook.description: Use the provided PowerShell script to audit all Exchange message items since April 2022 for properties with UNC paths. Run the script in audit mode to avoid data loss.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are any items considered malicious based on the script output?

extracted_playbook.title: Act on Malicious Items
extracted_playbook.description: Review and take appropriate action on any items considered malicious based on the audit script output.

extracted_playbook.title: Block TCP 445/SMB Outbound
extracted_playbook.description: Block TCP 445/SMB outbound from your network using a perimeter firewall, a local firewall, and VPN settings to prevent sending NTLM authentication messages to remote file shares.

extracted_playbook.title: Add High-Value Accounts to Protected Users Security Group
extracted_playbook.description: Add high-value accounts, such as Domain Admins, to the Protected Users Security Group to prevent using NTLM as an authentication mechanism. Be aware that this may impact applications requiring NTLM authentication.
